## VideoSourceProps interface

Properties of [VideoSource](./scribing.videosource.md)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface VideoSourceProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./scribing.videosourceprops.height.md) |  | number | Video height (in pixels) |
|  [placeholder?](./scribing.videosourceprops.placeholder.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Placeholder bitmap data (base64 encoded), to be shown before the poster is downloaded |
|  [poster?](./scribing.videosourceprops.poster.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ URL to an image to display before the video is downloaded |
|  [upload?](./scribing.videosourceprops.upload.md) |  | string | _(Optional)_ Identifies an upload operation that will replace this video source |
|  [url](./scribing.videosourceprops.url.md) |  | string | URL to the video |
|  [width](./scribing.videosourceprops.width.md) |  | number | Video width (in pixels) |
